item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (133 points | 28 comments)
2. Sainsbury Wing contractors find 1990 letter from donor (175 points | 37 comments)
3. A Collection of Free Public APIs That Is Tested Daily (13 points | discuss)
4. U.S. Ambassador says Canadians are consuming 'unhealthy' amount of American news (11 points | 3 comments)
5. Why is the Oral-B iOS app almost 300 MB? And why is Colgate's app even bigger..? (61 points | 33 comments)
6. Launch HN: Bucket Robotics (YC S24) – Defect detection for molded and cast parts (51 points | 15 comments)
7. Blitzortung – real time lightning strikes around the world (17 points | 3 comments)
8. DisTrO – a family of low latency distributed optimizers (5 points | discuss)
9. Box64 and RISC-V in 2024: What It Takes to Run the Witcher 3 on RISC-V (325 points | 121 comments)
10. Great Question (YC W21) Is Hiring Customer Support Lead ( | hide)
11. Malware infiltrates Pidgin messenger's official plugin repository (39 points | 3 comments)
12. Rustproofing Linux (Part 1/4 Leaking Addresses) (2023) (6 points | discuss)
13. NASA's SLS rocket's Mobile Launcher-2 increase from $383M to $2.7B (18 points | 7 comments)
14. New 0-Day Attacks Linked to China's 'Volt Typhoon' (155 points | 31 comments)
15. Vulnerabilities show why STARTTLS should be avoided if possible (6 points | discuss)
16. Splatt3R: Zero-Shot Gaussian Splatting from Uncalibrated Image Pairs (86 points | 19 comments)
17. Anthropic publishes the 'system prompts' that make Claude tick (239 points | 152 comments)
18. Unlocking the Pixel 9 bootloader breaks some Pixel AI apps (22 points | 6 comments)
19. Ruby in Jupyter Notebook (147 points | 48 comments)
20. Show HN: I Built DollarAI.Store – A Collection of 350 AI Tools (4 points | 2 comments)
21. We Can and Should Domesticate Raccoons (23 points | 14 comments)
22. A New Wave of Underwater Comms Is Coming (18 points | 3 comments)
23. Cerebras launches inference for Llama 3.1; benchmarked at 1846 tokens/s on 8B (55 points | 13 comments)
24. Just use fucking paper, man (54 points | 60 comments)
25. Zuckerberg claims regret on caving to White House pressure on content (293 points | 585 comments)
26. Docker Performance Evaluation Across Operating Systems (8 points | 3 comments)
27. MiniJinja: Learnings from Building a Template Engine in Rust (84 points | 37 comments)
28. Clay (short for C Layout) is a high performance 2D UI layout library (163 points | 59 comments)
29. Show HN: High school robotics code/CAD/design binder release (64 points | 17 comments)
30. The Triple Failure of 2U, EdX, and Axim (219 points | 157 comments)
